text: At Bricleir, we're revolutionizing the way F500 companies discover and access innovation from Silicon Valley. In short, we're building an online marketplace where startups (partners) do the work to make it easy for the F500 to discover initiatives and startups relevant to them. Our office is in downtown Palo Alto and we're looking for a lead engineer onsite to help us take our MVP to the next level as we close our second round of funding. Feel free to reach out to me if you're interested: ireland@bricleir.com
